description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国共产党党员。现任全国人大常委会预算工作委员会副主任，曾任该委员会法案室副主任。同时也是第十三届全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员和全国人民代表大会财政经济委员会委员。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China and a member of the Communist Party of China. He is currently the Deputy Director of the Budgetary Affairs Commission of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, having previously served as the Deputy Director of the Bill Office of the same commission. He is also a member of the Standing Committee of the 13th National People's Congress and a member of the Financial and Economic Affairs Committee of the National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第十三届全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the 13th National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会财政经济委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会财政经济委员会
全国人大财政经济委员会

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会的专门委员会之一，负责财政经济方面的议案和监督工作。
description.en: One of the special committees of the National People's Congress, responsible for proposals and supervision in financial and economic affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任全国人民代表大会财政经济委员会主任委员。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Chairman of the Financial and Economic Affairs Committee of the National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会预算工作委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会预算工作委员会
全国人大常委会预算工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会的内设工作机构，负责预算审查、监督等相关工作。
description.en: An internal working body of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, responsible for budget review, supervision, and related work.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任全国人大常委会预算工作委员会主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Director of the Budgetary Affairs Commission of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任全国人大常委会预算工作委员会主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Director of the Budgetary Affairs Commission of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任全国人大常委会预算工作委员会主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Director of the Budgetary Affairs Commission of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省直辖的县级市，由荆州市代管。
description.en: A county-level city directly administered by Hubei Province, People's Republic of China, and managed by Jingzhou City.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届国家最高权力机关。
description.en: The 13th National People's Congress, the highest state authority in the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 2018年3月，刘修文当选为第十三届全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员。
description.en: In March 2018, Liu Xiuwen was elected as a member of the Standing Committee of the 13th National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会财政经济委员会

description.zh-cn: 2018年3月，刘修文当选为第十三届全国人民代表大会财政经济委员会委员。
description.en: In March 2018, Liu Xiuwen was elected as a member of the Financial and Economic Affairs Committee of the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 刘修文担任全国人大财政经济委员会委员，该委员会的主任是徐绍史。
description.en: Liu Xiuwen served as a member of the Financial and Economic Affairs Committee of the National People's Congress, while Xu Shaoshi was the chairman of the committee.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会预算工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 刘修文自2013年10月起担任全国人大常委会预算工作委员会副主任，此前曾任该委员会法案室副主任。
description.en: Since October 2013, Liu Xiuwen has served as the Deputy Director of the Budgetary Affairs Commission of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress. He previously served as the Deputy Director of the Bill Office of the same commission.

description.zh-cn: 刘修文担任全国人大常委会预算工作委员会副主任期间，廖晓军是其上级主任之一。
description.en: During Liu Xiuwen's tenure as Deputy Director of the Budgetary Affairs Commission of the NPC Standing Committee, Liao Xiaojun was one of his superior directors.

description.zh-cn: 刘修文担任全国人大常委会预算工作委员会副主任期间，刘昆是其上级主任之一。
description.en: During Liu Xiuwen's tenure as Deputy Director of the Budgetary Affairs Commission of the NPC Standing Committee, Liu Kun was one of his superior directors.

description.zh-cn: 刘修文担任全国人大常委会预算工作委员会副主任期间，史耀斌是其上级主任之一。
description.en: During Liu Xiuwen's tenure as Deputy Director of the Budgetary Affairs Commission of the NPC Standing Committee, Shi Yaobin was one of his superior directors.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2018年2月24日，刘修文当选为第十三届全国人大代表（山东省）。
description.en: On February 24, 2018, Liu Xiuwen was elected as a delegate to the 13th National People's Congress, representing Shandong Province.
